data.name: EmergeNYC Demo
data.detailed_description: The EmergeNYC Interactive Demo allows players to view all of the vehicles featured in EmergeNYC in a turntable setting. Players are able to open compartments, view equipment, turn on emergency lights,  and we have unlocked sirens on certain ambulances for players to mess with. EmergeNYC early access is available on Steam for 35$ and unlocks the tech demo which allows players to drive the vehicles on our map with all completed features unlocked.
data.about_the_game: The EmergeNYC Interactive Demo allows players to view all of the vehicles featured in EmergeNYC in a turntable setting. Players are able to open compartments, view equipment, turn on emergency lights,  and we have unlocked sirens on certain ambulances for players to mess with. EmergeNYC early access is available on Steam for 35$ and unlocks the tech demo which allows players to drive the vehicles on our map with all completed features unlocked.
data.short_description: EmergeNYC is an Indie Simulation/Strategy game being developed for the PC and MAC OS. The game revolves around the emergency services in New York City (FDNY, NYPD, EMS) and throws the player in the shoes of a an emergency services worker in a fictional New York City.
data.reviews:
“Genre Bending Emergency Game”
10 – TheNorthernAlex

“I can not wait until game comes out”
10 – AcePilot2k7
